segments.pli: “Uppādā vā, bhikkhave, tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ, ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā.
segments.en: “Mendicants, whether Realized Ones arise or not, this law of nature persists, this regularity of natural principles, this invariance of natural principles:
A Realized One understands this and comprehends it,

segments.pli: Abhisambujjhitvā abhisametvā ācikkhati deseti paññāpeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti:
segments.en: then he explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it:

segments.pli: Uppādā vā, bhikkhave, tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā.
segments.en: Whether Realized Ones arise or not, this law of nature persists, this regularity of natural principles, this invariance of natural principles:
